vocabulary.definition: noting or pertaining to a long poetic composition, usually centered upon a hero, in which a series of great achievements or events is narrated in elevated style.
vocabulary.example: The movie was an epic tale of love and adventure.
She designed a beautiful garment for the fashion show.

vocabulary.definition: roaming about from place to place aimlessly, frequently, or without a fixed pattern of movement.
vocabulary.example: The nomadic tribe moved their camp to a new location every few weeks.

vocabulary.definition: compliance with standards, rules, or laws.
vocabulary.example: The school encouraged uniformity and conformity among its students.

vocabulary.definition: independence or freedom, as of the will or one's actions.
vocabulary.example: The country fought for autonomy from its colonial rulers.

vocabulary.definition: a system of society or government in which men hold the power and women are largely excluded from it.
vocabulary.example: The feminist movement aims to break down the structures of patriarchy in society.
